useCases.title: Internal Email Drafting
useCases.description: AI assists staff in drafting internal communications, responses to common inquiries, or routine updates.
examples: Summarize meeting notes into email updates

useCases.title: Knowledge Base Summarization
useCases.description: AI summarizes internal documentation, policies, or research to help staff find information faster.
examples: Summarize product documentation for sales team
Extract key points from lengthy policy documents
Create searchable summaries of meeting transcripts

useCases.title: Process Automation
useCases.description: AI automates repetitive back-office tasks like data entry, categorization, or report generation.
examples: Automatically categorize and route support tickets
Extract data from invoices or receipts
Generate weekly performance reports from data

useCases.title: Proposal and Content Drafting
useCases.description: AI helps create first drafts of proposals, marketing content, or client materials for human review and refinement.
examples: Draft initial project proposals based on requirements
Create blog post outlines and first drafts
Generate case study templates from project data

useCases.title: Decision Support Reporting
useCases.description: AI analyzes data patterns and generates insights to support strategic decision-making.

useCases.title: Opt-In FAQ Assistant
useCases.description: A customer-facing AI that answers common questions, clearly labeled as AI, with explicit opt-in and easy escalation to humans.
examples: Answer hours, location, and policy questions

useCases.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
useCases.description: AI suggests products or services based on browsing history or past purchases, with transparency about how recommendations are made.
examples: Recommend content based on past views

useCases.title: Open-Ended Support Chatbot
useCases.description: An AI chatbot that handles complex, open-ended customer support queries without clear guardrails. High risk of generating incorrect or frustrating responses.

useCases.title: Lead Qualification and Routing
useCases.description: AI analyzes incoming inquiries and routes them to the right team member based on content, urgency, or fit.
examples: Route support tickets to appropriate specialist
Flag high-value opportunities for immediate attention

useCases.title: Inventory and Demand Forecasting
useCases.description: AI predicts future demand to optimize inventory levels and reduce waste or stockouts.

useCases.title: Meeting Preparation and Briefing
useCases.description: AI compiles relevant background information, past interactions, and talking points before client or internal meetings.
examples: Gather relevant project status before reviews
Create briefing packets for sales calls

useCases.title: Content Moderation and Filtering
useCases.description: AI reviews user-generated content to flag inappropriate material for human review.
